languages.text: "Предлагаю перемирие. Отдай мне половину сокровища и Кунрада — и я тебя отпущу".
"I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I shall let you walk away with your life."
languages.original_text: "Предлагаю перемирие. Отдай мне половину сокровища и Кунрада — и я тебя отпущу".

traits.locale_text: "I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I will let you walk away with your life."
"I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I will let you walk away with your life."
"I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I will let you walk away with your life."
"I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I will let you walk away with your life."
"I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I shall let you walk away with your life."
"I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I shall let you walk away with your life."

languages.text: “我提议暂时休战。把维特威尔和你要的一半财宝给我，我就饶你一命。”
languages.original_text: "I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I shall let you walk away with your life."

traits.locale_text: “我提议暂时休战。把维特威尔和你要的一半财宝给我，我就饶你一命。”

languages.text: « Je vous propose un marché. Si vous me donnez Voigtvir et la moitié du trésor que vous cherchez, je vous laisserai repartir d'ici en vie. »
languages.original_text: "I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I shall let you walk away with your life."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous propose un marché. Si vous me donnez Voigtvir et la moitié du trésor que vous cherchez, je vous laisserai repartir d'ici en vie. »

languages.text: 「停戦を提案しよう。ボイトヴィルと宝の半分を渡せば、命は助けてやる」
languages.original_text: "I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I shall let you walk away with your life."

traits.locale_text: 「停戦を提案しよう。ボイトヴィルと宝の半分を渡せば、命は助けてやる」

languages.text: «Propongo una tregua. Dame a Voigtvir y la mitad del tesoro que buscas, y puedes salir vivo de esta».
languages.original_text: "I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I shall let you walk away with your life."

traits.locale_text: «Propongo una tregua. Dame a Voigtvir y la mitad del tesoro que buscas, y puedes salir vivo de esta».

languages.text: "Ich schlage einen Waffenstillstand vor. Gebt mir Voigtvir und eine Hälfte des Schatzes, den Ihr sucht, dann lasse ich Euch mit dem Leben davonkommen."
languages.original_text: "I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I shall let you walk away with your life."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schlage einen Waffenstillstand vor. Gebt mir Voigtvir und eine Hälfte des Schatzes, den Ihr sucht, dann lasse ich Euch mit dem Leben davonkommen."

languages.text: "Bir ateşkes teklifim var. Voigtvir'i ve aradığın hazinenin yarısını bana ver, ben de canını bağışlayayım."
languages.original_text: "I propose a truce. Give me Voigtvir and one half of the treasure you seek, and I shall let you walk away with your life."
